properties.name: cron.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable scheduled cron jobs. Accepted values: 'true' or 'false'.

properties.name: cron.opendata.events
properties.description: Cron expression defining the schedule for syncing event data from the Open Data source.

properties.name: cron.opendata.locations
properties.description: Cron expression defining the schedule for syncing event location data from the Open Data source.

properties.name: event.advance
properties.description: Time in advance to start retrieving upcoming events from the Open Data source.

properties.name: event.offset
properties.description: Offset is time used to adjust the event date range for data retrieval.

properties.name: aws.credentials.accessKey
properties.description: AWS access key used for authenticating with AWS services such as S3.

properties.name: aws.credentials.secretKey
properties.description: AWS secret key associated with the access key for secure authentication with AWS services.

properties.name: aws.bucket.fileImport
properties.description: Name of the AWS S3 bucket used for file imports.

properties.name: aws.s3.region
properties.description: AWS region where the target S3 bucket is hosted.

properties.name: spring.jpa.hibernate.naming.strategy
properties.description: Custom naming strategy used by Hibernate for mapping entity and table names.

properties.name: open.data.events.url
properties.description: URL endpoint for fetching event data from the Open Data source.

properties.name: open.data.event.locations.url
properties.description: URL endpoint for retrieving location data from the Open Data source.

properties.name: open.data.places.url
properties.description: URL endpoint for retrieving place data from the Open Data source.
